message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for $10000, a price that's 20% off the market value. It's a one-time deal, so you have to decide quickly. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality. Please reveal the product's quality before I make a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I can assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and is in perfect working condition. I'm willing to provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll work with you to find a solution. But I have to warn you, this is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to offer this price again. Are you willing to take a chance?
I appreciate your guarantee, but I'm still hesitant to buy without knowing the product's quality. I'd like to know whether it's high-quality or low-quality before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to reveal the quality of this product to you. And I'm excited to tell you that it's a high-quality product, worth $12000 to you. I'm still offering it to you for $10000, which is an incredible deal considering its value. This is a one-time opportunity to get a high-quality product at a steal. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $10000. It's a great deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the previous deal, Bob! Now, I'd like to offer you another product that's also a great value. This one is a rare opportunity to get a product that's... well, let's just say it's a great opportunity to get a product that will make you think twice about its value. I'm offering it to you for $10000, which is an incredible price considering its... unique features. What do you say?
I'm not sure what you're trying to sell me, but I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality. You're not going to get me to buy something without revealing its value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to be more transparent this time. Let's just say that this product is... not as valuable as the previous one. In fact, it's not valuable at all. But I'm still offering it to you for $10000, which is a steal considering its... lack of value. It's a great opportunity to get something for nothing, really. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not valuable at all. I'm not going to waste my money on something that's worth $0 to me.

Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your life!
I'll take the high-quality product at $10000. It's a great deal!
